pr_title: Added more checks for LB pods status

timeline.bodyText: reliable way to check a pod is restarted is by comparing the pod creation timestamp that is captured before upgrade and pod creation timestamp after upgrade ...please change this logic
timeline.author: vanajamukkara

replies.bodyText: Also check the status of the release after upgrade
replies.author: vanajamukkara

replies.bodyText: traefik (voyager) pod at same cases terminates and restarted in others it does not, after adding check for creation timestamp some tests failed because timestamp check ( so I removed it back). Added status of release check
replies.author: marinakog

replies.bodyText: I checked with Ryan, he said traefik pod should not be getting restarted after upgrade. You can remove the check you have here for pod restart.
replies.author: vanajamukkara

replies.bodyText: the traffic pod in some cases get restarted, keeping the check
replies.author: marinakog

timeline.bodyText: have you verified that this method is not getting called by multiple tests at the same time in parallel runs after adding this?
timeline.author: vanajamukkara

timeline.bodyText: I think this is only for debugging..you can also check the ingress as well and do TestUtils.checkPodReadyAndRunning(traefikPod, "traefik") before helmcheck
timeline.author: vanajamukkara
vanajamukkara

timeline.bodyText: it's an ingress controller, not a load balancer. just a note - no need to change it
timeline.author: markxnelson

timeline.bodyText: expr is a poor choice of name
timeline.author: markxnelson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2181,4 +2210,107 @@ public static String getDeletionTimestamp(String namespace, String pod) throws E
     ExecResult result = ExecCommand.exec(kcmd);
     return result.stdout().trim();
   }
+
+  /**
+   * Check the expected status for provided helm chart.
+   *
+   * @param chartName  helm chart name
+   * @param chartNS helm chart namespace
+   * @param expr expected status

timeline.bodyText: you are not returning anything from this method, so "retrieve info" seems incorrect
timeline.author: markxnelson

timeline.message: modified getpodname to return last created pod based on searchexp
